title: Cyberpunk Visual Redesign with Portfolio & Journal Removal

requirements.text: Remove all Portfolio feature code and UI from the application. Delete the Portfolio page (frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx), remove Portfolio navigation links from Layout.tsx, delete AddPositionDialog.tsx, PositionCard.tsx, and PortfolioSummary.tsx components, remove the usePortfolio hook (frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolio.ts), and remove all portfolio-related backend functions and state from backend/main.mo (portfolio Map, addPosition, removePosition, getPositions functions). Update the Router configuration in App.tsx to remove the Portfolio route.

quotes: remove them unless it will cause issues then you can just hide them

requirements.text: Implement a cyberpunk color scheme with deep black backgrounds and neon accent colors throughout the entire application. Update frontend/src/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js to define new CSS custom properties for the cyberpunk theme: near-black background (#0a0a0f or darker), electric blue accent (#00d9ff or #0ff), vibrant purple accent (#b300ff or #c0f), neon green accent (#39ff14 or #0f0), dark card backgrounds (#121218 or similar), and subtle border colors with low opacity. Replace all existing color references in components to use the new cyberpunk palette. Ensure text remains highly readable with appropriate contrast ratios (white/light gray text on dark backgrounds).

quotes: Neon accents with dark backgrounds (cyberpunk style)

acceptanceCriteria: index.css updated with cyberpunk CSS custom properties (near-black bg, neon blue/purple/green accents)
tailwind.config.js color palette reflects cyberpunk theme

Secondary accent colors include vibrant purple and neon green
All text colors provide high contrast on dark backgrounds

requirements.text: Add glowing effects to interactive elements and data cards throughout the application to enhance the cyberpunk aesthetic. Apply CSS box-shadow with neon-colored glows (using the accent colors: electric blue, vibrant purple, neon green) to buttons on hover, active cards, important data points, and interactive chart elements. Use subtle glow effects (low spread, medium blur) for ambient lighting on cards and stronger glows for focus/hover states. Implement glow animations using CSS keyframes for pulsing effects on critical alerts or high-confidence trading signals.

quotes: Glowing effects on cards and interactive elements

requirements.text: Update typography across the application to use tech-inspired fonts that complement the cyberpunk aesthetic. Configure tailwind.config.js to use a modern, geometric sans-serif font for headings (such as Rajdhani, Orbitron, Exo 2, or Space Grotesk) and a clean monospace font for numerical data, prices, and technical values (such as JetBrains Mono, Fira Code, or Roboto Mono). Ensure fonts are loaded via Google Fonts or similar CDN. Apply appropriate font weights (bold for headings, medium for body, regular for data) and maintain clear typographic hierarchy across all pages and components.

requirements.text: Add smooth CSS transitions and animations to enhance interactivity throughout the application. Implement transitions for hover states (0.2-0.3s duration), page transitions, card appearances, and data updates. Add subtle entrance animations for cards and list items using CSS keyframes or Tailwind animate utilities (fade-in, slide-in effects). Ensure animations feel responsive and modern without causing performance issues or motion sickness (use reduced-motion media queries for accessibility). Apply cyberpunk-style animations like scanline effects, glitch transitions, or data-stream aesthetics where appropriate.
